docs.snippet: LEAD: In July 1985, when Clayton K. Yeutter took over one of the prickliest posts in government as the Reagan Administration's trade representative, he was considered not only an outsider but also a bit of a rube even though he had served in the...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: In July 1985, when Clayton K. Yeutter took over one of the prickliest posts in government as the Reagan Administration's trade representative, he was considered not only an outsider but also a bit of a rube even though he had served in the Nixon and Ford Administrations.

docs.snippet: LEAD:  U.N. Iran-Iraq Military Observer Group  Created Aug. 9, 1988  Location: Iran-Iraq war front, with headquarters in Teheran and Baghdad  Mission: Observe cease-fire that took effect Aug. 20, monitor troop withdrawals, and assist in the exchange...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: U.N. Iran-Iraq Military Observer Group Created Aug. 9, 1988 Location: Iran-Iraq war front, with headquarters in Teheran and Baghdad Mission: Observe cease-fire that took effect Aug. 20, monitor troop withdrawals, and assist in the exchange of war prisoners. Participants: About 350 observers from Argentina, Australia, Austria, Bangladesh, Canada, Denmark, Finland, Ghana, Hungary, Indonesia, India, Ireland, Italy, Kenya, Malaysia, New Zealand, Nigeria, Norway, Poland, Senegal, Sweden, Turkey, Yugoslavia and Zambia.

docs.snippet: LEAD: There have been ''los tres grandes'' - Diego Rivera, David Alfaro Siqueiros, Jose Clemente Orozco - and a small handful of other artists from Latin America whose names sound, or whose paintings look, familiar to much of the art public in this...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: There have been ''los tres grandes'' - Diego Rivera, David Alfaro Siqueiros, Jose Clemente Orozco - and a small handful of other artists from Latin America whose names sound, or whose paintings look, familiar to much of the art public in this country. It is the admirable goal of ''The Latin American Spirit: Art and Artists in the United States, 1920-1970'' that the list of names grow longer.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The Federal Government charged today that an international bank holding company had conspired with cocaine dealers to launder millions of dollars in illegal drug money in a network that reached from the United States to Europe to the Medellin drug cartel in Colombia.

docs.snippet: LEAD: This is an example of one way money was laundered in the BCCI case, according to Federal officials.  Step 1: Drug dealers in such cities as New York, Detroit, Philadelphia or Chicago contact undercover agents, who are posing as experts on money...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: This is an example of one way money was laundered in the BCCI case, according to Federal officials. Step 1: Drug dealers in such cities as New York, Detroit, Philadelphia or Chicago contact undercover agents, who are posing as experts on money laundering, and tell them they have a pickup of one million dollars.
